items.sentence: I'm very glad that I've been singled out as being a suitable person for the job.
That man was standing a little ways away, but he turned when he heard Tom shout.
By the time I was a teenager, all four of my grandparents were no longer living.
Tom, I don't feel comfortable letting Mary go by herself, so please go with her.
Mary's email was very terse and it was clear that she was upset about something.
